Description: Replaced Iris dataset with the Penguins dataset.
Dropped missing values and encoded categorical target variables.
Used `bill_length_mm` and `bill_depth_mm` as features instead of PCA-transformed features.
Added `logging` for better tracking of process execution.
Used `accuracy_score` for evaluation instead of direct `classification_report`.
Implemented decision boundary plotting using `matplotlib` and `seaborn`.
